name: Dimensional Storages

pages.text: You can put it inside other backpacks, and you can put backpacks inside this.$(br2)All dimensional storage with the same color and owned by the same player shares the same inventory space, for both item and block form. If pickup mode is configured, insertion to block follows pickup / destroy mode.$(br2)Supports quick access in anywhere.

pages: Features:$(li)This can be put on chest slot (or back slot of Curios), and can be opened via key bind.$(li)$(l:mechanics/any_access)Quick Access$(/l)$(li)$(l:mechanics/quick_insert)Quick Insert$(/l)$(li)$(l:mechanics/exit)Menu Stacking$(/l)$(li)$(l:mechanics/pickup)Recursive Pickup$(/l)$(li)Press ALT to insert as Pickup$(li)Shift + right click to place it as a block
